operation.add:
<style type="text/css">
				[data-toggle-id] i {
					font-size: 20px;
					cursor: pointer;
				}
				[data-toggle-id] i.disabled::before {
					display: none;
				}
				[data-toggle-id] .fa-spinner {
					color: #000;
				}
				[data-toggle-id] .fa-check-circle {
					color: #4cb64c;
				}
				[data-toggle-id] .fa-times-circle {
					color: #e3503e;
				}
				[data-toggle-id] .fa-exclamation-circle {
					color: #f3a638;
				}
				</style>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
				$('[data-toggle-id]').on('click', function() {
				  var element = $(this);
				  var i = element.find('i');

				  $.ajax({
					url: 'index.php?route=catalog/product/toggle_status&user_token={{ user_token }}',
					type: 'post',
					data: {
					  product_id: element.data('toggle-id')
					},
					dataType: 'json',
					beforeSend: function() {
					  i.button('loading');
					},
					complete: function() {
					  i.button('reset');
					},
					success: function(json) {
					  if (json['success']) {
						i.toggleClass('fa-check-circle fa-times-circle');
					  } else {
						i.addClass('fa-exclamation-circle');
					  }
					},
					error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) {
					  console.log(thrownError + "\r\n" + xhr.statusText + "\r\n" + xhr.responseText);
					}
				  });
				});
				//--></script>
